snippet: Losses from farms idled by drought are hitting hard among farmers and those who relied on paychecks from working for them.
abstract: California is facing its worst drought in modern history, and losses from idled farms are hitting hard among farmers; thousands of farm workers who rely on paychecks for tending fields are expected to go unemployed; Central Valley is massive stretch of land in middle part of state that provides nearly half of nation's produce; farmers will have to rely on private wells.
lead_paragraph: Losses from farms idled by drought are hitting hard among farmers and those who relied on paychecks from working for them.

headline.main: California Seeing Brown Where Green Used to Be
headline.print_headline: California Seeing Brown Where Green Used to Be
